Content:: Illinizas Ecological Reserve (sometimes referred to as Illinizas National Park) is a protected area in Ecuador, located in the provinces of Cotopaxi and Pichincha. The reserve consists of 149,900 hectares, and lies 55 kilometers south of Quito. Coordinates: 0°42′08″S 79°03′52″W﻿ / ﻿0.7023°S 79.0645°W﻿ / -0.7023; -79.0645 This Ecuador location article is a stub. You can help Wikipedia by expanding it.
